message: Still gnawing on that dried out bone Jeff? We didn't agree on anything, I posted scientific facts and you made yet another unsubstantiated claim, that's it. You have yet to credibly refute anything I've said. All you've done is engage in your usual tactic of using gimmicks like logical fallacies to deflect from your failures. You're right about one thing, our education levels are different. I'm obviously better educated and informed than you are as the evidence continues to prove.

In less than a week after this broadcast I was heading North down 3rd Street when I spotted a Chevy 3/4 ton at Todd's Muffler Shop. It had been broadsided in the passenger side, so I had to go back to see what I had just seen. The quarter panel and gas tank were wrapped around the frame, No sign of fire anywhere. And, , GM had steel tanks then.

Met a young admirer of Chris who wanted adventure and claimed willingness to risk death at 19! To live in freedom. My response was disapproval and that I'd miss him if he died but would feel no guilt or remorse as I'd live on and prosper... but what a pity to waste his life that was precious ylto me...even if not to him he survived and a year later as he left thailand to return to the UK he admitted what had been driving him had been a wish to end his life. I strongly suspected such about him AND the MCANDLESS youth. These kids need attention and tough love.. not permission to proceed.
